about-me.title: About me
about-me.desc:
I am a web developer with more than {{ years }} years of commercial experience gained in the global polish software house. My strongest point is Angular framework but I have also some experience with different programming languages and tools. I am interested both in frontend and backend development.

As Linus Torvalds, creator of Linux kernel and Git system version control, said: „Talk is cheap. Show me the code”, so be sure to check my github account where I have developed some sample web applications to proof my profession.

My interests include non-fiction and popular science literature, ancient Greek and biblical exegesis. I am also an author of extensive web platform apologetykabiblijna.pl, built and deployed on my own from scratch with popular MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, Angular and Node).

work-experience.title: Work experience
work-experience.desc: Implementation complex web applications for loyalty management.
